span.br: Remote Learning Opportunities | IT Crisis Support

div.div: Do you have a rising Pre-K or Kindergarten student that will be attending DPS next year? Pre-enrollment is up and running!
div.a: Read More about Pre-K and Kindergarten Registration

div.div: As we are enduring this unprecedented time, one of our Division’s main goals is to make sure our students are continuing to be offered meals each day. Follow the link for distribution locations.
div.a: Read More about DPS Meal Distribution Plans

div.div: Pending the ever-evolving impact of the Coronavirus Pandemic and the Governor’s Executive Order 53 closing school for the remainder of the year, the tentative plans for graduations can be found in the link above.
div.a: Read More about DPS Announces Tentative Graduation Plans

div.div: Dr. Jones had the opportunity to "go live" on WBTM with Josh Lineberry. This is an effort to leverage the radio as a medium for transparency regarding decision making during this crisis.
div.a: Read More about Danville Public Schools COVID-19 Update

div.div: DPS has partnered with Successful Innovations to offer families a free resource to support their children in the classroom. Click the link above for more information.
div.a: Read More about Family Engagement on Demand

div.div: Due to the COVID-19 concerns, we are postponing our 2nd Annual STEAM Night. More information to come.
Follow this link to take the Community Stakeholder Survey 2020-2021 Annual Needs Assessment for Federal Grant Programs
